Detailed Description

vtkToolEndovascular class implements a surgical endovascular tool.

This class inherits from vtkTool, and serves as base class for specific endovascular techniques tools: vtkToolCatheter, etc...
A few specific movements (rotation, insertion, etc...) has been defined to control the tool.

Member Function Documentation

void vtkToolEndovascular::AddDepth ( double  step) [virtual]

Add a distance to the current tool depth.

Set the tool depth position. The modification is made by transforming the tool's mesh (vtkPolyData).

Parameters:
stepZ axis value (local coordinate system)

void vtkToolEndovascular::RotateX ( double  angle) [virtual]

Rotate the tool in degrees from current orientation about the X axis using the right hand rule.

Standard laparoscopic tool X-axis rotation. Mobile pieces are processed in implementation classes
